commit.message:
Make more traits of the From/Into family diagnostic items

Following traits are now diagnostic items:
- `From` (unchanged)
- `Into`
- `TryFrom`
- `TryInto`

This also adds symbols for those items:
- `into_trait`
- `try_from_trait`
- `try_into_trait`
